website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that features a 1,000-foot  range and a large number of chimes and tunes to choose from.
pros: Comes with one transmitter and one receiver (additional receivers are also available)
Good for temperatures from -4 to 140 degrees Fahrenheit
Small  receiver with 52 chimes and tones and 5 adjustable volume levels
cons: Reports that the transmitter button doesn't always trigger the chime
Some buyers felt that the available chimes were of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Just get this, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a doorbell, get this one! I have had other plug and play doorbells, NONE as good as this one! Like 4-5 volume settings (including no sound, so just the light blinks!) and like 20 or more different songs, tones, and animal sounds (Little Mermaid, symphony classics, expected chimes, goats, cats, dogs, birds....so many music options!) that are very clear. It looks sleek and mounts easily. I can't comment on battery life yet but I don't even care... it's 110% worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: A. V. R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and loud enough to hear throughout the house.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install with the adhesive. Works out of the box. Plenty loud. Just make sure to remove the transmitter battery plastic first. I'm probably the only one that wishes there were less tones on this thing. They take forever to cycle and most are super cheesy. I just want like 5 high quality doorbell sounding ones to pick from. I think I went back to the default sound.
customer_reviews.author: Thehutt

customer_reviews.title: Range is so helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I have the button on the door, and the buzzer on the opposite side of the house, where I work. I don't have to worry about not hearing someone knock, or missing the UPS guy when he brings a package (I just have a sign on the door that says to ring the bell). Also, there are soooo many sounds to choose from (a lot of them unnecessary). I have mine set to the Big Ben chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Update:it is not waterproof, water will lead from the button. Easy to setup this wireless doorbell, just plug in the receiver, choose the ringtone and volume you like, and then stick the doorbell outside(comes with a sticker that no drilling is required). How easy~! we love the "Meow" sound, very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Xu

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, more than loud enough for our 1800 sqft home, extremely easy to install. Most of the sound options are silly, would have liked more natural ring options rather than silly noises and tunes. Would still recommend this for the price, the important features are certainly there.
customer_reviews.author: happicamper88

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised. UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: Installed this next to the gate on my front yard privacy fence. It's only about 50' away from the receiver but it's loud and clear. Still not used to it, so it kind of freaks me out when it goes off. Even though my state is in the grips of a drought, we did get a decent rain shortly after I mounted it and it weathered it just fine. (get it? weathered?} UPDATE: since this review, the doorbell has died and is now a useless plastic thingy underneath my brass 'Please ring doorbell' sign. Keep up the good work China.
customer_reviews.author: ClementsB

customer_reviews.title: Stops ringing after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product the first time in April 2018... after a few months in crapped out. I thought maybe it’s a defective unit. And my parents loves it since it’s loud enough for them to hear. So I figured done I’ll buy them another which I did October 2018. Guess what happened again, it just stopped ringing again. This is a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Nadoosh21

customer_reviews.title: hard to install
customer_reviews.text: There was no adhesive tape in the box & was not able to use it. In the instructions it said there was adhesive tape in the box to mount the ringer by your door. Came with screws but my arthritis hands cannot put them in. Very misleading advertising! Money just thrown away on this item!
customer_reviews.author: nas6car

customer_reviews.title: Bunches of choices for tunes on your doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Our "Front" door is on the side of the house and we seldom use it. Instead, we usually go out the garage door. I put this doorbell next to the garage door key pad with a note to ring that bell for deliveries (mostly from Amazon). It seems to be working. Most deliveries are now being made there, instead of at the front door. Our front door has the usual 4 note Westminster chime and this one has one of about 50 tunes so it is easy to tell if someone is at the garage or the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie1429

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: First the good , extremely easy to install. Now the bad, if you install the chime in the outlet directly above the bed where the cats sleep each of them will only have eight lives left. I chose the goat chime unbeknownst to me at that time was the cats while they were sleeping are afraid of goats screaming in their ear. With any luck all of the scratches should heal naturally overtime
customer_reviews.author: Rater

customer_reviews.title: Child's toy
customer_reviews.text: My first clue was that this showed up in a box the size of a pack of cigarettes - only smaller. I was also suspicious when they listed 52 ring tones. Out of all of them, I could only find one that even came close to a normal doorbell, and the rest would appeal only to the under age 10 group. The buttons were tiny. There was nothing about this unit that equated to value near what it cost. It got the heave-ho back to Amazon, and I ordered the Honeywell Series 9. THAT is a serious piece of hardware, for about the same money.
customer_reviews.author: JADFLY

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bad range and consistency
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use it as the existing bell was not working properly. But was disappointed after testing it. Not sure how it has so many good ratings. It has very bad range. Doesn't work even within 50ft with few walls in between. The button needs to be pressed like 10 times to ring the bell once within close range. Decided to return it. The sound level is not bad though for few tones, but you won't hear it if you are inside your room with music playing at medium volumes and if the bell is a little away from room.
customer_reviews.author: Anand

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and works great with one ANNOYING flaw!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is decent quality and works fine for its intended purpose BUT if power cuts out for any reason and then comes back on it chimes full volume each time power is restored. We live out in the boonies and have windstorms that will cut power in and out sometimes several times over the course of an evening when there is a storm. This thing chimed 4 times one evening between 2-3am during a storm until I unplugged it. There is really no justifiable reason for it to chime each time it loses power (and comes back on) so I have to subtract 2 stars for SUPER annoying functionality.
customer_reviews.author: MDS Photos

customer_reviews.title: Simple install
customer_reviews.text: So far it works well, due to the fact that I don't have a back doorbell, and didn't want the hassle of having a wired bell installed...Also it was soooo simple to install!! Simply place the tape strip on the back of the bell, and mount it outside of the back door, then plug the sound piece in a area that's good for u to hear it around the house, and you're done!!!
customer_reviews.author: LOYAL CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Yes but also EHH.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. It was easy to pair and install, however my only complaint, and it's actually a big one which is why this is only getting 3 stars (I want to give 2 stars, but I'm fighting that urge), is that the ringer selection is total CRAP. There are ONLY two "doorbell" sounds (and they aren't even that great...) and the other 50 are ALL stupid songs like "Oh Susana". How about a few more doorbell sounds?? Where is the "classic" doorbell chime? I am VERY disappointed. It makes me want to return it, to be honest. I still might.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Battery stopped working after less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, however 2 months later it stopped working. After all troubleshooting, it comes to the battery must not be good. I will be writing to Avantec to petition for a replacement, as it claims a 3-year battery life. Update*: I didn’t bother with the complaint and just bought a new battery, and that was in fact the problem. It has given no issue since I replaced the battery. Still disappointed that I had to do that so soon but not sure if it’s the seller or Avantek that is to blame.
customer_reviews.author: Conan W. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 sets.  One set would not pair.  Waited a while then it paired, then it quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 doorbells. One set paired very easily and worked fine, but the other set wouldn't pair. Couldn't find internet support other than Amazon review Q&A. Finally got the other set to pair after messing around several hours, then it quit working in less than an hour, just like a video someone submitted. Will return both doorbells since they cannot be trusted. Wasted a lot of time fooling with it. Wouldn't recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 whole days
customer_reviews.text: Sound stopped working after less than a week. I ended up returning it. Disappointed since it did have quite a lot of song choices.
customer_reviews.author: StevieSteve

customer_reviews.title: Very functional Wireless door bell!
customer_reviews.text: There is not much to say about it. -The material looks and feels high end. -The design is modern and eye catching. -The outside unit is weatherproof and the battery last forever (we are using it for the last 3 years). There is no discoloring on the unit. -You can change the tones of the bells and the sound is more than enough to hear. -the range is satisfying. We installed the receiver in the hallway behind a coffee table. No problems at all. It’s really worth to try. You will not regret it. We are satisfied and highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Busybeeerc

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the reviews! CHEAP JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what is going on here, either I'm very picky and used to quality products or I'm living in the twilight zone. This is a extremely CHEAP and ineffective doorbell. If you like musical doorbells that are just annoying, BUY IT. This is not very loud and the tones are just god awful! If your looking for a regular doorbell you can actually hear, and has a choice in actual doorbell chimes, this isn't it. I bought this based on the reviews and I can't be more disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Love it...........
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy right out of the box. My only regret is not ordering the set with the extra receiver (chime). Simply because we are often in our basement with the tv and other things going on. Because the chime must be plugged into an electrical outlet, we are somewhat limited in our location choices. This is not the fault of the chime, but because our house does not have enough electrical outlets. So....I will order another chime. Had I explored a little more thoroughly, I would have discovered, and bought, the unit with two chimes. My fault. Looking forward to lots of happy chimes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dotinsoin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little gadget good value
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell seems to work very well we installed it right away with no problems I'm not a huge fan of the Midi ringtones on it however they serve their purpose and how often do people really come to your door and ring the doorbell. my house is concrete block construction And if somebody knocks if we're in the back we can't hear anything. But we can hear this doorbell ring loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Charlami

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Didn't work like it was supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Returned it..... receiver didn't pair with transmitter.... went through steps in the troubleshooting section.... couldn't find the protective film covering the battery..... wasn't sure where the battery was anyway actually..... as the customer shouldn't have been expected to deal with a low battery right from the start anyway! Was really looking forward to this product but, it turned out to be a real disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: MVM

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised and is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this product! It works as it is designed to. I installed the controls in my kitchen on a wall about 25 feet from the door and the bell button is outside by the door. It is loud enough that I can hear it from another room.
customer_reviews.author: Don J Richards

customer_reviews.title: Works like charm "door bell"
customer_reviews.text: Loving how I don't have visitors banging on my front door anymore and all they need to do is ring the door bell once. You get a good selection or ringers plus the ability to control the volume. love how its small and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Emeterio C.

customer_reviews.title: Great small doorbell, weird ring options
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell was super easy to program and install. Tried the adhesion backing at first, but it fell off in less than 12 hours. Used the screws, which I should've done in the first place and it is nice and secure. The volume is really nice as we are able to hear it anywhere in the house with other noise going on via the television, oven vent, etc. The only thing I knocked it for was the ring sound offerings. It boast having 52 different options, but realistically only two of them are doorbell like. The rest are these obnoxious noises that I can't understand why anyone would choose. Why program a doorbell with everything but doorbell ring tones? lol
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper from Lake Charles, LA

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Bell
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to install this door bell and it is a great value for the price. I do wish it had more of a volume control because even at the lowest setting it is awfully loud, even in a good-sized house. I was very excited about all the different sound options but found there were more novelty sounds (dog barking, Happy Birthday theme) than "regular" door bell rings/chimes. One of the reviewers attached their door bell with velcro which is what I ended up doing. This way the door bell ringer is easily removed if you have to power-wash your house.
customer_reviews.author: Elke L.

customer_reviews.title: these are great!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one I bought so much, I bought another. Lucky thing they don't trigger each other. I used them in an office building. One is for the basement suite and one is for an upstairs suite. The button and the ringer are separated by a fair amount of distance, concrete and steel, and yet they work fine! My basement tenant loves all of the different ring options for the bell. Installation was a snap. Just sticker the button to a wall and plug the ringer into any plug.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Teufel

customer_reviews.title: Works Sometimes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this doorbell in order to let our children in the basement know that they were needed upstairs. I hate all the yelling that happened before the bell. However, it only works about half the time. You have to keep pushing the button about 4 times before you can get it to ring downstairs. We even tried moving both receivers to see if that would improve the consistency, but it was the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Security Door Bell
customer_reviews.text: We had a security door installed in addition to our regular front door and it blocks our "ring" door bell. We needed something that would stick on steel and cordless. This was the perfect product and the awesome part is we can change the "chime or sound" based on quite a number of choices.
customer_reviews.author: gariam

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy - Installed in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: So the original doorbell seems to have a short in the line somewhere in the walls. - I did try replacing transformers etc - Just no power to the bell :( So rather than dealing with re-running cables in the call for a stupid door bell... This do hickey did the trick! Just mount the wireless button - Plug in the speaker thing -adjust volume and choose the chime you want. Blam instant door bell.
customer_reviews.author: PiyoPiyo

customer_reviews.title: Effective, affordable alternative to a wired doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: Low-cost alternative to a wired doorbell. Works quite effectively. Has something like 54 available tones. Most are animal noises or bits of songs I don't recognize; to each his own, I just use the default doorbell sound. Very easy to install if you can drill a hole and drive a screw. My only dislike was that the button/transmitter unit is held on its base by fine rectangular plastic loops which break easily unless you're very careful punching out the holes for the mounting screws. All in all, effective and very affordable product for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: H. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly even the outside temperature is 30F!
customer_reviews.text: I have a doorbell at home, unfortunately, when the temperature drop, the door bell is dead! (It’s really frustrated that a door bell can only work in the summer!) I did a lot of research and saw this had great reviews! Giving it a try, and yes, it works! It works perfectly even when outside is below 30F. They are many ringtones you can choose from, and you can adjust the volume! I plug the “ring box” in the kitchen, approximately 30 foot away from the door bell, it works flawlessly! Loud enough with my favorite canon in d melody. High recommended! In addition, I like the black color! :)
customer_reviews.author: Heleb87

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell button comes with a 3-5 year battery installed, you just need to stick it to your wall with the weather-resistant double-side tape, or it comes with a bracket that you can screw in. We used the tape and it’s still working after a few months. The bell alert plugs into the wall. There are a ton of ring tone openings and you can control the volume. Everything was so easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Reis

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: The main unit is much smaller than I expected. I attached it to a standard dual outlet that has USB ports on the side and the good news is that it doesn't block those ports. Pairing was easy - actually didn't do anything. Worked right away. The default bell was very pleasant. I tried some of the other fifty some sounds - dog barking, rooster, other animals and I stopped and went back to the default. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because on these units the ringer plastic turns yellow after about a year - i'll check back next year and update.
customer_reviews.author: Snowlion

customer_reviews.title: Almost too easy
customer_reviews.text: This was ridiculously easy to install. You literally just pull off the sticky backing and push the doorbell to the wall and then plug in the other device in your house. I didn't even mess with the settings because I was happy with the default 'ding dong ding dong". We've had issues with our old doorbell actually ringing for years but I kept on with it because it was a fancy recording one. We have security cameras anyway so the fancy doorbell was unnecessary. I just needed and 'ding dong' and I'm so happy I have it now for cheap and basically zero installation.
customer_reviews.author: Karbear

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to laptop
customer_reviews.text: It has a good sound, BUT can only use with iphone. It will not connect to laptop no matter what they say. You can use the jack to play from computer, but it does not connect with Bluetooth. I had an old speaker from an old computer that I could connect with the jack, so this one is a big disappointment. I contacted company but they suggested several things which I tried with no luck. I could not reach them by phone. I've spent hours, days trying to make it work. So don't believe them when they say can connect with bluetooth to laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great value and purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up. Very loud and has many chimes. My daughter was excited over the holiday and birthday chime. I bought this one based on the positive reviews and it wasn’t expensive. My old doorbell that was hardwired into my home started acting up and an electrician wanted to charge me a lot of money to install a new one. I thought to check on Amazon and see if wireless doorbells existed and I am very pleased that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Clean and professional looking button. Tones are often silly but to each his own. If they could make this better it'd be to add a motion sensor so that the button lights up as someone approaches. Minor complaint is that each tone seems to double the first note unless you're really quick to press the button, but if you hold the button down it doesn't just repeat the first note over and over so it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: So many choices on the ring tones! We are currently using the super-loud bell tone (sounds like a regular doorbell but on steroids! LOL). This has worked well for our office. Since COVID19 we no longer allow anyone to walk-up to our office for deliveries or sales calls so we left the clicker on a table at the main door entryway down a flight of stairs. The plug-in unit remains upstairs in our office. Great product for a great price. I'm not sure about weatherproof since our entryway is covered. Would recommend and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Shocked in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this but for $15 what the heck right? I didn't want to go through the hassle of wiring a doorbell so this was perfect. I used our drill to cut through the back of the bell part (as the instructions say) and it sits and installs perfectly. The 52 ringtones are like phone ringtones and no one wants a 10 second tone everytime the door rings, so we stuck with the classic ding dong. I love that the receiver can be unplugged and moved anywhere at anytime and it still works. If I have a cookout I can plug it in the back yard and it still reaches!
customer_reviews.author: IWORKALOT

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bell/receiver runs off electricity rather than battery. The ringer/transmitter has a supposedly long-lasting battery (I don't know how long as we've only had it a few months) -- it's one of those little discs so I expect it will last awhile. The ringer's plenty loud enough to have only one for a fairly large house. We only use the standard ding-dong sound cuz we're not into kitschy jingles to announce the arrival of FedEx deliveries and such. But to each their own; there're a lot of choices if one is so inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Tanuki

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work after awhile
customer_reviews.text: It broke after two months or so. We do not have a lot of people that ring a doorbell. Just a few times during those two months, not even more than 10 times. We found out that it was broken when the delivery guy said that he rang the doorbell but no one answer. But we never heard the doorbell. So we went to try it ourselves. When we pressed it, water was coming out. It broke probably the rainwater got into it. So it is not weatherproof. I am not satisfied with this product. It only rained a few times during these two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mounting tab broke while installing...I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Doorbell is not bad. Problem is with mounting it. When opening the button part for the first time, the mounting tab at top of mounting plate broke off. Now the doorbell button cover part comes off much too easily. It likely will not last long with regular use or with the weather. I contacted the seller asking for a new mounting plate. They offered me a $3 refund and said I would have to buy the whole doorbell assembly once again. No thanks. Bad customer service. And a poor design on the mounting plate. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Steinkoenig

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for my buck
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. I really like this bell. Its like selecting a ring tone for ur phone. I must admit. Not alot of "bell" selections. Sometimes u want ur door bell to sou d like a door bell but with different variety of it. But then again i selected Beethoven Fur elis. As for easy instal, u dont even need the direction. Simply plug in pull the plastic strip from the button n select ur favorite. It would be great for kids. It has alot of kiddie tunes. Im very satisfied with my purchase. Best bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Door Bell
customer_reviews.text: It works great and was very simple to install. One minor problem was adjusting the volume when the button is on a different floor level. It would be nice if the bell could be adjusted without pressing the button at the door. That requires 2 people. It would be much better to change the volume, at the bell, and have it chime each time so you can get the desired loudness. I expected the LED light to be brighter when the bell rings. The loud chime is what gets my attention, rather than the blinking LED.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Widman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect find for someone not wanting a camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has like a 100 different tones from roosters crowing to regular door bell sound!!! My home is 2400sqft and this can be heard through out my entire house and it isn't even turned all the way up! Yes, it even wakes me from a deep sleep and the "speaker" is 3 rooms down the hall and to the kitchen away!!! This buy was well worth it. I have tried this out without reviewing for 2months now. It's easy to install, going strong, and still works like new!!! Virginia's weather hasn't bothered it at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved into a new condo and didn't want to deal with the hassle of installing a wired doorbell. After searching all over I finally came across this particular one. This doorbell is absolutely perfect and beyond easy to install. No screws, wires, or drilling needed. Simply use the 2 sided tape that comes with it and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Burton

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 sets, so we have push buttons at front and back door and 2 receivers in different parts of the house that each play the different tunes for front door and back. It works great and it was easy to pair the 2 transmitters with the 2 receivers and set different sounds for each. I like the look of the doorbells and appreciate that they refrained from printing the company name on the doorbells. We have the transmitters and receivers separated by several block walls and over 100 feet and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Huie

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Had it set up for two days and it already doesn’t work! Junk.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: easy solution!
customer_reviews.text: a super easy to install solution when you don't have power at a door for a doorbell. VERY loud we used just the one chime and located it on the main floor at the base of the stairs and you can hear it upstairs, on the main floor, and in the basement. You can change the volume and chimes but it worked for our needs right out of the box. Not sure how the adhesive would hold up in a high heat area (which is what we have) so we used a screw (both options were included in the package).
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: Installation, Easy As Stick and Plug
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought years ago. I went so long without one thinking they were hard to install. So easy to install. The ringer button has a peel stick tape to tape anywhere you want. And you have a sound box that you plug into an outlet. With that box you pick your ringer and volume. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Installed in just a few minutes, double sided adhesive tape seems strong enough (time will tell). Can't comment yet on the battery life in this Florida heat (accidental purchase, meant to buy one that uses the 23A battery since I have some). I personally don't need 52 chime choices, but maybe some like variety. So far it's doing the exactly as I hoped it would, even though I mounted it on the metal frame of my screened porch. Price was reasonable. Overall a good purchase, even if it was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ren1216

customer_reviews.title: WORKS  GREAT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new front door bell, our old one (35 years died) so I started looking around and then I saw this one and we liked the idea of having so many different tunes and also the fact that it did NOT need batteries !!!! We just love it. One of our daughters saw it and she took a note of this one and was going to buy one. I had it up and running in about 5 minutes. If you need a new bell BUY THIS ONE. WOWWWWW. Thanks Brian in Keller Texas.
customer_reviews.author: ONSLOW

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for price
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new duplex that my wife & I lease. Nice place, granite cabinets tops etc. But WHAT?...no doorbell of waste disposal. Can't do anything about waste disposal, but knew Amazon could help with a doorbell. It's great..only took about 15 minutes to install, including pairing from the button at the door to the unit that you just plug in anywhere you like. Has about 80 different sounds. Chose a nice melody for our sound. Can't go wrong with this doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barbee

customer_reviews.title: Super easy installation, great range
customer_reviews.text: If I timed the installation, it would probably be under 2 minutes - honestly. Super easy and worked with no issues. The only 'con' I would report is the volume control options. The softest setting is still pretty loud IMO. I suppose many people will like that, though I had to put the receiver far so it's not as jarring.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherShopper

customer_reviews.title: Little door bell
customer_reviews.text: Received the package promptly. There is a nice selection of bell ringtones. The only issue I have with this is the adhesive backing (yes there were screws included -I didn’t want to attach it that way)when I went to peal it off the whole white and the adhesive came right off. I had to try and peal and see if it will keep the bell attached out. Otherwise that minor little problem, the little bell works as promised.this is the second time I’ve brought this bell but the black version. It’s a good bell for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY STOCKMAN

customer_reviews.title: its alright
customer_reviews.text: the sound is on the tin side. it works as a doirbell, no issue with range at least for me as i placed the receiver 10 ft away. just dont expect to sound like a real doorbell like “ding dong”. on a side note, i tupically get double trigger everyime the button is pushed, no biggie but i would consider that a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Chin-chin

customer_reviews.title: Overall -  Nice looking Door Bell Chime
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well. I've had other ones that cost twice as much and never seem to work very well. It's easy to install and volume controls are easy to change as well as the different tones. I like the fact that it is black and stand out on the house. I like that it uses a flat CR2032 battery rather than one of those awkward looking batteries that are hard to find in the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great basic doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a digital doorbell which worked for about 3 months. But it now does not hold the batter charge, and never seems to be working when someone comes to the door. So I got this basic doorbell. It is working great. Love the simplicity and ease to use and intall.
customer_reviews.author: dbm23j

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I was going to like it but it works very well and I like that you can change the sound settings on it and if needed I can move the doorbell plug around my house-so if I have to be in the basement but I’m expecting people I will without a doubt know they’ve arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, screw installation is tricky, love the bell sounds/songs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BELL! It’s exactly as pictured. I had a difficult time opening the bell to up on the screws because I didn’t want to break the back. You have to make the holes for the screws. I’ll be putting the door bell button up tomorrow. I’ll update the review as time goes on to see if it’s waterproof and it’s durability. Overall I tested the bell and it works. Plus the different sounds and songs are great! They even had the “under the sea” from the little mermaid and a few Mozart songs as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my grandpa to call my little brother who is downstairs. So I can testify the distance, sound control, and sound selection, but not that it is weatherproof since it's inside. When you press the button it immediately goes off :). You can range from loud to quiet, it starts off at it's loudest. And there are a lot of sounds and some of them funny. I use a loud horn sound since my little brother would ignore anything else lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mosberger

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so that I could have 2 doorbells (front/back door) No issues setting them up. The volume is extremely loud and can be heard upstairs and downstairs. I highly recommend this doorbell for anyone looking for an easy to use and setup product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Works great, if only people would use it
customer_reviews.text: I realized after my dog died that I was having trouble knowing when I had a visitor. My door is on the ground floor, but I'm usually upstairs and dow. The hall. This was easy to install and program (i.e., choose a ring and volume). I plugged the receiver in my upstairs bathroom (due to lack of outlets in the hall). The range is terrific and I have no trouble hearing it from any room. Still have trouble knowing when the pizza is here though... So many people just assume that door bells don't work and don't bother pushing the button! I think this was a good value and I'm pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kimball Marine

customer_reviews.title: It's very loud
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this door bell is the lowest volume is still extremely loud. This would be great for someone hard of hearing but if you have normal hearing and a smaller home it's super loud. I actually put the speaker in my garage because it was so loud. The upside to this door bell is that it's very affordable and works well, the ringer to speaker has a good range and will work at a good distance and through multiple walls
customer_reviews.author: Nikky

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it 5 stars for simplicity of install and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific bell. Lots of sound options. Good range. I can we this having many uses. Purchased to replace my regular dingdong doorbell that my dog overreacts to. She barks and goes rocketing down the stairs and is going to hurt herself. She does not react to the tunes an sounds of this door chime. If she starts reacting to one sound I'll change to another. Going from Mozart to a rooster she'll never know it's the doorbell. LOL
customer_reviews.author: StarReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Too many “unusual” tones
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that out of 52 different tone options, only 1 is like a normal doorbell. It’s amusing that you can choose from different animal sounds (my toddler thinks it’s funny), but having a dozen of them is a bit excessive. Then all the other tones are songs that are way too long to use as a doorbell. There is ONE standard bell tone, and even that one isn’t really “standard” because the bell dings two time for each push. Just strange. I will probably return this.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Comes with key to open battery pack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item I got it right away and I didn't have to read the directions and I already had it plugged in I take to the key to it and I put the tape on the back of the Ringer and put it outside. I ordered tape to come with it because I did not realize that it came sticky sided tape for putting it outside. So in short it comes with a key to open the back, and sticky tape. So you wont have to buy. It also comes with screws, but I decided sticky tape was the way to go. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install, awesome price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: The volume options are the only negative as I wish there was one more volume level, still a tad too loud at the lowest setting. But still deserves 5 stars for ease of use and ring tone options. Took less than 2 minutes to set up, we used adhesive to attach. It's Christmas time so we have the jingle bells ring right now and it brings an instant smile every time it rings. Plus the dog hasn't figured out the ring means someone is at the door so she isn't barking when it rings! We will have fun choosing new ring tones in the new year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: After moving into a new place, we didnt have a doorbell and I wasnt about to drill into the wall and wire one up on a property that I am renting. So instead I spent a couple dollars on this Doorbell. Super easy to setup. Just follow the Manual. My wife had fun looking through all the available melodies, so you have plenty of options to suit what you like. The outside button was slapped into place and has endured some pretty heavy rainstorms and wind. It hasnt fallen off, and still works just fine so overall this little thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Sound variety 👌
customer_reviews.text: Love all the fun songs! You get so many to choose from, including Under the Sea from The Little Mermaid! Animal sounds, lullabies, etc. Although the knocking one is weird because I specifically got a doorbell so I wouldn’t have to hear loud knocking. I would like if it could get quieter, but volume control is good. Really loud for a big house, or if you’re watching a movie. I switch it up now and then for a different tune. It’s neat because people who visit get to hear the songs when they ring the doorbell. It looks nice too. Real sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Quinneth Cavaghan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell literally only works after pushing the button 5+ times
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jean

customer_reviews.title: I like all the ring tone choices.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. I stuck it to the glass of my security door. I should have used screws that would go into brick or mortar but that is on me. It is set up for easy installation into wood. This is the second time I’ve purchased this door bell and my other house had a wood frame around the door. My new place is from 1900 and I should have been more. prepared Still the door bell works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: T. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Solid Sound and Breezy Setup
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy good value for what this doorbell delivers. The battery states a 3 year life cycle with the assuming it's pressed 10-15 times a day. The volume was quite loud and I tuned it down to my liking. The range is quite pleasing as well. Living in frigid Minnesota with turbulent cold fluctuations will put this to the durability test. I hope this unit holds up well over time as I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: IMIAN

customer_reviews.title: I can hear the doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: We've had a few wireless doorbells and we like this one the best. It was beyond easy to set up & install but the main thing is the ring. The last one we had we couldn't hear even at the loudest setting (and its decibel rating was the highest of the various bells we checked on Amazon). This one we had to turn down to the second highest setting. And the price was very reasonable. Definitely recommend this doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Laren Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Our front door is deep inside our gate and we have a dogs. Our ring is by our front door but I never knew if anyone was outside the gate. Now I do, because until I can afford another ring I needed to know if anyone was outside and too afraid to come in, which is good. It’s survived multiple rain storms and works great. Very very loud and tons of song and ding choices. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my husband to use as an emergency call button. He works in the garage with multiple power tools and if he injured himself but couldn't get up he would be out there possibly for hours before someone would go out there. Now we both have peace of mind that if he was injured he has a way to easily call for help. It works both in the garage and when he is outside behind our RV. He also had fun picking out the ringtone! I made a pouch with a clip so it clips to his belt loop.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Then it got worse. It wouldn't work from two feet away
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this item. The doorbell button ended up not working properly after a week. At first, I thought it was the range or that it was not synced. Then it got worse. It wouldn't work from two feet away. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaE

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad who lives in an apartment. He has trouble hearing someone knocking on his door. This was the perfect solution-there is no need to drill any holes in walls and the volume is adjustable. Very easy to install-the double stick tape seems secure. The chime is clear and can be heard from anywhere in his apartment and it's not even set at the highest volume. If he decides to move elsewhere, he can take it with him. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Espresso Bean

customer_reviews.title: Love the options
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I can’t hear knocks at the door when on the other end of the house, so this solves that problem. I love the volume adjustment and all the sound options. I like that it has some unconventional sounds that doesn’t sent my dog into bark mode. No barking from my dog equals not waking my sleeping baby
customer_reviews.author: kpmcne

customer_reviews.title: Knock knock
customer_reviews.text: Ive been ordering more online during quarantine and it became apparent the way ups knocks on my apartment door is too jarring. I needed a quieter notification that a package has arrived. Ironically, I ended up using the tone that is knocking and turned the volume down. I have no complaints except the volume button Isnt the easiest to use. But the doorbell looks really good I chose black.
customer_reviews.author: kg

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well So Far
customer_reviews.text: My wired doorbell bit the dust. Could be a transformer, bad wires, who knew. Decided to go with this. Super Easy to install. Too many ring tones to select from...although it was fun to listen to some of them as they reminded me of my childhood. Ended up with the regular door bell ring. I live in a very small house, like postcard size, but I think the volume could be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Ricechex

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy install doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and works great. Looks high tech. People have thought there was a camera - obviously there isn’t. I used the adhesive to install the button and it’s been great. You can’t tell it’s just a sticker. Bonus- so far the dog doesn’t bark like crazy when someone is at the door. Lots of chime options, none I’m super excited about but it’s nice to have lots of options.
customer_reviews.author: justmyopinion

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, LOUD (if you want it to be), 52 chimes (how many do you need?)...no complaining though, easy to install, IP rated for weather, solved my problem of missing packages/having to be home/different mail people doing things differently... I am disabled & get 5-10 packages a month. In my new building the property manager and owners are CHEAP AS HELL!!! But I was able to solve my problem with less than $12! If it doesn't work the same for you, just return it and get your money back. But I'm on the 3rd floor in back, while the button is on the ground floor in front. Good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: donjuggalo

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works great, wish I there were more volume settings.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works great, wish I there were more volume settings. Even at it's lowest volume its quite loud which is probably good for a larger place but for a small apartment I think it's a little loud. But it was easy to install, instructions were easy to follow, and it worked! It's a great option if you don't have a doorbell. We'll see how long the battery will last.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalC

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, Easy to operate and great sound. It sounds real (the bells). The stick -on-pad works well on the keypad outdoors. The receiver is flat enough to mount anywhere (mine is between the refrigerator and a wall. I'm a ham operator and none of my radios interfere with this thing. That's good news for people who transmit at 100s of watts. I'm giving the volume control a 4 cause its a little difficult to operate once installed. Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: 5port

customer_reviews.title: Its Really loud!
customer_reviews.text: Its really loud , i have no complaints thus far, the one thing i do llike about this is if you have to change the battery on the remote , it comes off without having to worry about taking off the adhesive the back can stay on the adhesive taped to your door or wall etc, and you can change the battery, now lets see if the battery last a long time like it claims
customer_reviews.author: The TROUBLESHOOTER

customer_reviews.title: Loud and can be heard all over my home
customer_reviews.text: I moved into an apt that didn’t have a doorbell and decided to order one. This is great. I just placed the doorbell, which contains a battery, underneath the door knocker & plugged in the gizmo, that came with it, inside my apt. It’s as loud as any doorbell you would want. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Unique in its own way.
customer_reviews.text: I was using this for a while until I got a Ring. Super easy installation. You don’t have to wire anything. So many ringtones to choose from and different volume levels! The waterproof tape on the back of the doorbell is so strong that I had this at my apartment, took it off, put it on my Grandmother’s home and now she uses it. The design of it is unique. A black doorbell?? Come on, that’s dope! Got a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Loud and lots of tone selections
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my classroom as an attention getter. It plugs into the wall and it's pretty much good to go once the battery is in the remote. There is volume and tone selectors on the wall device, whereas the remote simply has the button to ring it. There are a ton of different rings to choose from, even holiday themed ones The one downside I've noticed is that at max volume, the sound is a bit distorted. Other than that, it's worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Danger

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Door Announcer
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my review because I discovered a small shed in between transmitter was interfering with signal. I am using on automatic chicken house door to confirm it opens and closes as it should. I mounted the push button on the jamb and made a plastic strip on the door press the button as the door closes or opens. I doubt the true range is 1000 feet but it's working at 300 feet with no obstructions.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Lord

customer_reviews.title: Awesome remote doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way for someone in the house to signal to the detached garage. This worked perfectly - can be as LOUD as you want, and many sounds and tunes to choose from. The remote has great range - I'm using it about 50 feet. It would work great as a doorbell - it has a modern looking button, a very clean look with perfection functionality. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SP3204

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING TO HAPPEN TO MY HOUSE IN AWHILE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this doorbell. I live in a very old home, and the doorbell was long broken when I bought it and missing from the front facade of the house. I was looking for something wireless, so I didn't have to go putting lots of holes in walls. This doorbell was so easy to use , a child could install it. Not only that, but it is loud enough for me to hear it throughout my three-level home with only one receiver plugged in. I am totally impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Erin Dow

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. Volume is nice and loud and chimes are plentiful and clear! Please note there is a plastic tab which needs to be pulled off the battery in the door bell portion before the unit can be paired. I thought mune was defective until I figured this out. Read the instructions front to back and there was no mention of the tab.
customer_reviews.author: Coolj21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Took all of 5 minutes to install. The hardest part was using the "key" to pry off the back of the transmitter and pulling out the plastic under the battery. Back piece went flying then the battery shot out like a champagne cork. Nothing broke though, so all good. Chose the fading bell tone, set the volume and YAAAY! My new home has a doorbell!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi498

customer_reviews.title: Must push this harder and longer than a real doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use on the outside of our business during the state’s shutdown for COVID. It was an inexpensive, easy way to have customers announce they were at our door to pick up items. The only downside was that the first few days nobody pushed the button hard enough and we missed several customers. I had to add a sign under the doorbell telling them to press hard for 3 seconds. It worked like a charm after that. I’m really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C F

customer_reviews.title: Loud! Working well
customer_reviews.text: Working well. Really loud. Perfect for my gate as the builder put the door bell at the front door which is on the other side of the gate (sigh). Like the different chimes available. Didn’t rate the weatherproofing as it’s just a recent install. I rarely give a 5 star overall...because nothing is perfect. But so far I’m very happy. Transmitter and receiver are about 40 feet apart through several thick walls and no issues! Aloha
customer_reviews.author: Dfnsmn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does it exactly what it promises to do. A great inexpensive solution for an old house without a doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Ohana Films

customer_reviews.title: Discreet Minimal Profile and It Works So Well
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, simple and while the adhesive may work for some, I had a friend screw this outside. The sound can be lowered as my dog thought we were under attack at my mistakenly choosing the loudest sound. The average sound is not upsetting, my dog emerged from under my bed and is fine, thanks. Very attractive and basic, a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: madeleine gallay
